name: Hungry Grandmas
description:
Poor grandmas can't go out of the house. Deliver them food form the supermarket to make them happy <3 Dont smash your trashy car.

This is the account of my teammade: https://trustyduck.itch.io/

I did the design and programming. My teammate did the art. For the music we used the Ultimate Game Music Collection and for the sound effects the Universal Sound FX. Both were acquired through a Humble Bundle.
